items.title: Ghislaine Maxwell makes pitch to Supreme Court
items.description: The U.S. Supreme Court should hear Ghislaine Maxwell's appeal of her 2021 sex trafficking conviction, her lawyers argued in a brief to the Supreme Cou...

items.title: Several hurt in shooting outside casino in Reno: Police
items.description: Several people were injured in a shooting outside a casino in Reno, Nevada, on Monday morning, officials said.

items.title: Heat indices could hit 120 as sweltering temperatures grip eastern half of US
items.description: More than 185 million people across most of the United States are on alert for widespread, dangerous heat on Monday.

items.title: LIVE:  ABC News Live
items.description: 24/7 coverage of breaking news and live events

items.title: WATCH:  Passengers exit plane via emergency slide after aborted takeoff
items.description: Passengers evacuated onto the runway via emergency slide after an American Airlines flight aborted its takeoff on the runway in Denver on Saturday.
